head.title: A Chance to Honor The Tulips of Modernism

hedline.hl1: A Chance to Honor The Tulips of Modernism

block.p: Fashion trends are usually a year or two ahead of those in home furnishings, but this year is different: metallics are big, and to mark the 50th anniversary of Eero Saarinen's Tulip collection of furniture -- the classic pedestal chairs and tables -- Knoll is offering them in platinum.
All Tulip furniture ordered between now and Aug. 1, 2008, in any color (white, black or platinum) will have a commemorative medallion on the underside.
